snippet: HALL--Alice Flanagan. On March 1, 2016, Alice Flanagan Hall, formerly of New York City; beloved wife of Robert A. Hall, devoted mother of Patricia Hall, Suzanne Hall Contrera and her husband Joseph, and the late Lorraine Hall, and loving grandmother of Jack and Andrew Contrera. Mrs. Hall was a 1952 graduate of Hunter College in New York City. A memorial service will be held on Saturday, March 12, 2016 at 11:00am at Fairhaven Chapel, 7200 Third Ave., Sykesville, MD 21784. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HALL, ALICE FLANAGAN
